list_definition.definition: to do what is wanted by (a person); to give pleasure or satisfaction to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You can’t please everyone all the time
It pleases me to read poetry.

list_definition.definition: a word added to an order or request in order to be polite

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Will you please come with me?

list_ex_of_english: A vocal delivery that might seem haughty or conceited, too mellifluous or elegant, excessively 'musical', or calculated to please others must be avoided.
